section.name: Objective
section.p: The objective of the Struts 1.0.1 release is to provide an official release of all the bug fixes and documentation updates that have been made to the STRUTS_1_0_BRANCH branch since the release of Struts 1.0.

section.name: The Plan
section.p: Since the release of Struts 1.0, a number of important bugs have been fixed, and some notable improvements have been made to the documentation. Currently, these updates are available only to those people who are willing to obtain the source code from CVS and build their own version of Struts. This release will make these updates available in an official distribution, thus making them available to a wider audience.
Therefore, the following release plan is proposed for Struts 1.0.1:

ul.li: Code Freeze / Tag Date - Wednesday, November 21, 2001

Release Announcement - To the following mailing lists and web sites:
announcements@jakarta.apache.org
struts-dev@jakarta.apache.org
struts-user@jakarta.apache.org
jsp-interest@java.sun.com
servlet-interest@java.sun.com
http://www.freshmeat.net

section.name: Release Criteria
section.p: Prior to the release of Struts 1.0.1, the following action items must be completed:

ul.li: The Struts 1.0.1 Release Notes document shall be updated to describe substantial changes and improvements since the Struts 1.0 release, along with associated updates to the main Struts Documentation Application pages describing the new release.

All of the Struts example applications that are included with the release shall operate successfully in the following servlet containers:
Tomcat 3.2.3
Tomcat 4.0.1
A release vote shall take place on the struts-dev mailing list to approve this plan. The release vote MUST pass by "Majority Approval" of Struts committers.
